lead_paragraph: ISSELBACHER--Marga (nee Schiff). Born in Oberthulba, Germany June 6, 1927, passed away on January 17, 2016 surrounded by family in New York City. Doting mother and grandmother of Jesse, Tina, Kassidy, Samantha and Haley. She loved her family, Bob and Marjory Schiff, Carmen and Audrey Isselbacher, Gail Berney, Jonathan and Amie Schiff. She sorely missed the love of her life, Henry. Graveside service on Tuesday, January 19; Shiva at her home. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ISSELBACHER, MARGA (NEE SCHIFF)
